option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
set the number of baud in the Barker phase code to nbaud (default is 1, ie no phase coding). Valid options are 1,2,3,4,5,7,11,13.
set the range resolution to rsep km (default is 45).
set the number of range gates to nrang (default is 75).
set the distance to the first range gate to frang km (default is 180).
set the multipulse increment to mpinc microseconds (default is 2400).
